name: df-afv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cafv(c0, c1), caiota(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
comment: Alternative definition of the value of a function, ` ( F ''' A ) ` , also known as function application. In contrast to ` ( F `` A ) = (/) ` (see ~ df-fv and ~ ndmfv ), ` ( F ''' A ) = _V ` if F is not defined for A! (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.) (Revised by BJ/AV, 25-Aug-2022.)
